simulated_ratings.feeling: Dimension-hopping dread and undead battles are far beyond my comfort zone.

simulated_ratings.title: Exorcist III, The (1990)

simulated_ratings.title: The Man from Nowhere (2010)

simulated_ratings.title: Gummo (1997)

simulated_ratings.title: What's in a Name (Prénom, Le) (2012)

simulated_ratings.title: Notting Hill (1999)

simulated_ratings.title: Lifted (2010)

simulated_ratings.title: 50 First Dates (2004)
